item.title: 堡垒之夜》在欧盟地区的 iPhone 上回归，并在全球范围内登陆安卓系统
item.description: 多人射击游戏《堡垒之夜》（Fortnite）开发商 Epic Games 周五表示，在欧盟采取法律措施后，该游戏在时隔四年后再次登陆欧盟的 iPhone 和全球的谷歌 Android 设备。【原文：Multiplayer shooter game Fortnite is available again on iPhones in the European Union and worldwide on Google's Android devices after a gap of four years, following legal measures by the EU, developer Epic Games said on Friday.】

item.title: 穆迪称，现金清算审查威胁到财富管理公司的信用评级
item.description: 穆迪（Moody's）周四警告称，监管机构对财富管理公司现金清算计划的一系列调查可能会损害其信用评级，这凸显了摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）和富国银行（Wells Fargo）等公司的高利润业务所面临的威胁。【原文：The spate of regulatory investigations into wealth managers' cash sweep programs could hurt their credit ratings, Moody's warned on Thursday, underscoring the threat to the high-margin business for firms like Morgan Stanley and Wells Fargo .】

item.title: 标准普尔 500 指数和纳斯达克指数六连胜后期货走高
item.description: 周五，美国股指期货走高，此前 S&P 500 指数和纳斯达克指数连续六个交易日上涨，原因是一系列令人鼓舞的经济数据推动了在重量级科技股和成长股带动下的广泛反弹。【原文：U.S. stock index futures edged higher on Friday after the S&P 500 and the Nasdaq logged six-session winning streaks, as a spate of encouraging economic data fueled a broad rebound led by heavyweight tech and growth stocks.】

item.title: 恒大陆上项目管理人在会议前向债权人了解详情
item.description: 官方文件显示，在11月14日召开第一次债权人会议之前，恒大一家主要在岸部门的管理人已要求债权人提供有关这家陷入困境的房地产开发商所欠债务的详细信息。【原文：The administrator of a major Evergrande onshore unit has asked creditors to provide details about the debt the embattled property developer owes to them ahead of the first creditor meeting to be held on Nov. 14, official filings showed.】

item.title: 早间竞标：美国经济蓬勃发展，四分之一个百分点就够了
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 巴西首次公开募股市场复苏希望破灭
item.description: 对巴西财政健康状况的担忧和高利率使多达 20 家巴西公司今年上市的希望破灭，从而结束了巴西一度蓬勃发展的首次公开募股市场长达两年的干旱。【原文：Concerns about Brazil's fiscal health and high interest rates have helped dash hopes that as many as 20 of its companies could go public this year, ending a two-year drought in the country's once-booming IPO market.】

item.title: ExodusPoint 上半年资产减少 10 亿美元
item.description: 据一份监管文件显示，ExodusPoint 资本管理公司 2024 年上半年管理的资产减少了 10 亿美元。【原文：ExodusPoint Capital Management reported a $1 billion drop in assets under management in the first half of 2024, according to a regulatory filing.】

item.title: 华尔街一周前瞻 经济衰退恐慌后 "软着陆 "希望重燃提振美股
item.description: 经济软着陆的希望再次推动美国股市走高，因为令人鼓舞的数据缓解了继本月早些时候惨遭抛售之后对经济衰退的担忧。【原文：Hopes for an economic soft landing are once again powering U.S. stocks higher, as encouraging data relieve recession worries following a brutal sell-off earlier this month.】

item.title: 哈里斯瞄准顽固的高房价
item.description: 副总统卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）的竞选团队表示，她周五在北卡罗来纳州罗利市的演讲将以经济为重点，特别是围绕她当选总统后降低成本和打击 "企业哄抬物价 "的计划。【原文：Vice President Kamala Harris' speech in Raleigh, North Carolina, on Friday will focus on economics, and specifically around her plans to lower costs and target "corporate price-gouging" if she is elected president, according to her campaign.】

item.title: 福特因发动机起火风险召回约 8.5 万辆汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周五表示，由于担心发动机起火，福特汽车公司将召回约85,000辆配备警用拦截多功能套件的Explorer越野车。【原文：Ford Motor is recalling about 85,000 Explorer SUVs equipped with the Police Interceptor Utility package over concerns of an engine fire, the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Friday.】

item.title: 德州仪器将根据《CHIPS 法案》获得高达 16 亿美元的资助
item.description: 模拟芯片制造商德州仪器公司周五表示，该公司将从美国商务部获得多达 16 亿美元的直接资助，用于支持在国内新建三座工厂。【原文：Texas Instruments will receive as much as $1.6 billion in direct funding from the U.S. Commerce Department to support the construction of three new domestic facilities, the analog chipmaker said on Friday.】

item.title: 中国暂时阻止了债券多头的步伐
item.description: 在中国政府加强干预以阻止收益率下降之后，投资者纷纷退却，中国债券市场长期以来的疯狂反弹已经停滞，价格下跌，成交量下滑。【原文：A long, frenzied bond rally in China has stalled, with prices down and turnover tumbling as investors step back after intensifying intervention by Beijing to stop yields from falling.】

item.title: 监管机构称，因安全气囊风险，宝马和合资企业将在中国召回 136 万辆汽车
item.description: 中国市场监管部门周五表示，由于高田安全气囊存在潜在风险，德国汽车制造商宝马及其合资企业将在中国召回合计136万辆国产和进口汽车。【原文：German automaker BMW and its joint venture will recall a combined 1.36 million locally produced and imported cars in China due to potential risks with the Takata airbag, China's market regulator said on Friday.】

item.title: 独家报道德意志银行提出的邮政银行案和解方案遭原告拒绝
item.description: 德意志银行的一名原告律师周五表示，德意志银行已向起诉这家德国最大银行收购邮政银行时支付过低报酬的股东提出了和解方案。【原文：Deutsche Bank has made a settlement offer with shareholders who had sued Germany's largest bank for underpaying them for the acquisition of Postbank, a lawyer for the plaintiffs said on Friday.】

item.title: 中国经济增长乏力，现金券话题再起
item.description: 又一轮糟糕的中国经济数据增加了中国政府的压力，迫使其进一步放宽财政政策，甚至发放购物券，以使经济增长回到今年约 5%的目标。【原文：Another round of bad Chinese economic figures is raising pressure on Beijing to loosen the fiscal spigot further and even dole out shopping vouchers to get growth back towards this year's target of roughly 5%.】

item.title: 市场反弹，外国人抢购日本股票，如释重负
item.description: 截至 8 月 10 日的一周内，外国投资者大举买入日本股票，原因是在最近的动荡之后，决策者发出了稳定市场的信号，这使日本股市出现了自 1987 年以来最大的单日暴跌。【原文：Foreign investors heavily bought into Japanese stocks in the week to Aug. 10, encouraged by policymakers' signals to stabilize the market following recent turmoil which had sent shares into their biggest one-day plunge since 1987.】

item.title: 早间投标对经济增长的担忧迅速消退
item.description: Rae Wee 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rae Wee】

item.title: 马来西亚中央银行乐观，经济增长速度为六个季度以来最快
item.description: 在家庭支出、出口和投资强劲的推动下，马来西亚第二季度的经济增长速度达到了 18 个月以来的最快水平，马来西亚央行预计全年经济增长将接近其预测区间的上限。【原文：Malaysia's economy expanded at its fastest rate in 18 months in the second quarter helped by stronger household spending, exports and investment, with the central bank forecasting full-year growth to come in near the upper end of its forecast range.】

item.title: 新西兰央行行长宣布圣诞节前再减息两次，2025 年再减息两次
item.description: 新西兰央行行长阿德里安-奥尔（Adrian Orr）周五提出了在年底前再降息50个基点的明确前景，并表示 "我很乐意实现这一目标"，他的明确评论为果断的宽松政策指明了方向。【原文：New Zealand’s central bank governor Adrian Orr on Friday raised the distinct prospect of cutting rates another 50 basis points by year-end, saying "I would love to be delivering that" in explicit comments setting the course for decisive policy easing.】

item.title: TikTok 在法庭上诉中质疑美国对华关系的说法
item.description: TikTok 周四向联邦上诉法院表示，美国司法部错误陈述了该社交媒体应用与中国的关系，敦促法院推翻要求中国字节跳动公司出售 TikTok 美国资产或面临禁令的法律。【原文：TikTok told a federal appeals court on Thursday that the U.S. Department of Justice has misstated the social media app's ties to China, urging the court to overturn a law requiring China-based ByteDance to sell TikTok's U.S. assets or face a ban.】

item.title: 经济增长担忧消退，日本股市迎来四年来最佳一周
item.description: 周五，由于华尔街蔓延出乐观的风险情绪，亚洲股市迎来周线上涨，日本基准日经指数有望创下四年多来最好的一周，而美元和美国国债收益率则基本持稳。【原文：Asia shares were headed for a weekly gain on Friday and Japan's benchmark Nikkei was poised for its best week in over four years as upbeat risk sentiment spilled over from Wall Street, while the dollar and U.S. Treasury yields held broadly steady.】

item.title: 盈利超预期后，JD.com 股价将上涨 6.5
item.description: 中国电子商务集团京东在香港上市，周五其股价将大涨 6.5%，此前该公司公布了超预期的季度利润报告，降价吸引了对成本敏感的消费者进入其平台。【原文：The Hong Kong-listed shares of Chinese e-commerce group JD.com were set to jump 6.5% on Friday after it reported forecast-beating quarterly profits, helped by price cuts that lured cost-conscious consumers to its platform.】

item.title: 美国经济重燃热情，油价将实现周度上涨
item.description: 周五亚市早盘，油价走低，但在乐观的美国经济数据缓解了投资者对头号石油消费国潜在衰退的担忧之后，市场基准油价将连续第二周上涨。【原文：Oil prices edged lower in early Asian trading on Friday, but the market's benchmarks were set for a second consecutive weekly gain after upbeat U.S. economic data eased investor worries about a potential recession in the top oil consuming nation.】

item.title: 美国数据平息经济衰退担忧后美元坚挺
item.description: 由于美国经济数据强劲，几乎消除了人们对经济衰退的担忧，美元兑日元汇率在创下四周来最大单日涨幅后徘徊在两周高点附近。【原文：The dollar hovered near a two-week high to the yen after its biggest one-day gain against major peers in four weeks as firm U.S. economic data all but eliminated fears about a recession.】

item.title: 新加坡 7 月出口同比增长 15.7%，增幅高于预期
item.description: 周五的数据显示，新加坡7月份非石油国内出口同比增长15.7%，其中电子产品和非电子产品出口均有增长。【原文：Singapore's non-oil domestic exports rose 15.7% in July from a year earlier, data on Friday showed, with both electronics and non-electronics exports growing.】

item.title: 政治不确定性可能促使日本央行暂停而非结束加息路径
item.description: 首相岸田文雄的下台决定所带来的政治不确定性很可能会导致日本央行从接近零的水平稳步提高利率的计划暂停，而不是完全停止。【原文：The political uncertainty left by Prime Minister Fumio Kishida's decision to step down will likely lead to a pause, rather than a full stop, to the Bank of Japan's plan to raise interest rates steadily from near-zero levels.】

item.title: 澳大利亚国民银行第三季度现金收益下降近 8
item.description: 澳大利亚国民银行周五报告称，受住房贷款市场竞争加剧和运营费用增加的影响，该行第三季度现金收益下降了8%。【原文：National Australia Bank reported as much as 8% drop in its cash earnings for the third-quarter on Friday, hurt by rising competition in the housing loan market and higher operational expenses.】

item.title: 加利福尼亚州旨在通过要求储备汽油来解决油泵油价暴涨问题
item.description: 加利福尼亚州州长加文-纽森（Gavin Newsom）周四提出一项计划，要求炼油厂保持最低限度的汽油储备，以防止价格飙升。【原文：California Governor Gavin Newsom proposed a plan on Thursday requiring oil refiners to maintain minimum reserves of gasoline in an effort to prevent price spikes.】

item.title: 克罗格计划在 Albertsons 合并结束后降价 10 亿美元
item.description: 连锁超市克罗格（Kroger）公司发言人周四表示，该公司计划在与规模较小的竞争对手阿尔伯森（Albertsons）完成拟议的 250 亿美元合并后，将杂货价格降低 10 亿美元。【原文：Supermarket chain Kroger plans to lower grocery prices by $1 billion after the completion of its proposed $25 billion merger with smaller rival Albertsons , a company spokesperson said on Thursday.】

item.title: 收益令人失望，Stellantis 股东在美国起诉汽车制造商
item.description: Stellantis在美国遭到股东起诉，称这家欧美汽车制造商在公布令人失望的收益导致股价下跌之前，隐瞒了库存增加和其他弱点，欺骗了他们。【原文：Stellantis has been sued by shareholders in the United States who said the European-American automaker defrauded them by concealing rising inventories and other weakness, before posting disappointing earnings that caused its stock price to fall.】
